title: admin.stopMining() panic after mining
body:
**Version Information**

```
$ geth version
Geth
Version: 0.9.4
Protocol Version: 59
Network Id: 0
GO: go1.4.2
OS: darwin
GOPATH=/Users/aeufemio/projects/gocode
GOROOT=/usr/local/go
```

**Stack Trace**

```
[aeufemio@kingmob ~/projects/gocode/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum (Mon Mar 30 19:01:52 JST 2015) ] (develop) geth --loglevel "0" --port "30304" --nat "any" console

> admin.startMining()
true
> web3.fromWei(eth.getBalance(eth.coinbase).toNumber(), "ether")
'901.125'
> web3.fromWei(eth.getBalance(eth.coinbase).toNumber(), "ether")
'901.125'
> admin.stopMining()
panic: close of closed channel
```
